role_limits.min: At least __limitValue__ __roleName__ nodes are required (__count__ selected currently).
role_limits.recommended: It is recommended to have at least __limitValue__ of __roleName__ nodes (__count__ selected currently).

statistics.help_to_improve: Help us to improve your experience by sending Mirantis information about the settings, features, and deployment actions when you use Mirantis OpenStack.
statistics.help_to_improve_community: Help us to improve your experience by sending information about the settings, features, and deployment actions when you use Fuel and OpenStack.
statistics.statistics_user_info: Note, that if you agree to send statistics, a new user under "fuel_stats_user" name will be added to your OpenStack environment. The fuel_stats_user will collect information about OpenStack workloads.
statistics.statistics_includes_full: Usage statistics include the following. Information such as passwords, ip addresses, and node names are not included.

actions.operation_type: Operation type (adding cluster, adding node, deployment, removing node, e.t.c.)
actions.actual_time: Actual time that is took to complete the operation
actions.network_verification: Network verification - whether it was used, and what was the result
actions.ostf_results: Is OSTF used, and tests results

setting_labels.send_user_info: Identify my error reports so that Mirantis Support can assist me
setting_labels.send_user_info_community: Identify my error reports so that Mirantis Support can assist me
setting_labels.name: Name

errors.name: Please fill in your name
errors.email: Please fill in correct email address

welcome_page.title: Welcome to Mirantis OpenStack
welcome_page.change_settings: You can change your settings at any time by updating your user profile information.
welcome_page.thanks: Thanks for helping to improve Mirantis OpenStack!
welcome_page.thanks_community: Thanks for helping to improve Fuel and OpenStack!
welcome_page.statistics_collector: Web UI for collected statistics is under development and will be available at
welcome_page.privacy_policy: Usage stats will include your name, company and email once you login to your Mirantis account

register.register_installation: Connect this installation with your Mirantis account and receive important notifications about security updates and other improvements.
register.connection_error: Looks like this machine is not connected to Internet. Please check connection and try again
register.required_fields: Please note that all fields are required.

notifications_popover.no_notifications_text: There are no notifications to display

support_page.title: Support
support_page.contact_text: If you need to report a problem or just suggest an improvement, click the button below. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
support_page.irc_text: If you have any questions, you can also reach out to developers on the IRC channel
support_page.log_text: If you have encountered some bugs or errors, you may need to provide the support team with deployment and operational logs. You can download them all at once by clicking the button below.
support_page.register_fuel_content: This will ensure that you receive important notifications about security updates and other improvements. In addition you will be notified about new versions of Mirantis products.
support_page.product_registered_content: This OpenStack installation is connected to
support_page.capacity_audit_text: To better manage your resources, you can run this report to find out what OpenStack roles have been deployed across all of your environments.
support_page.community_text: The page contains the most recent Fuel documentation. You can read it online or download in PDF.
support_page.mirantis_text: The page contains the most recent Mirantis OpenStack documentation. You can read it online or download in PDF.

configure_interfaces.title: Configure interfaces on __name__
configure_interfaces.bond_speed_warning: Bonding interfaces of different speeds is not recommended
configure_interfaces.drag_and_drop_description: You can drag and drop logical networks between interfaces

validation.too_many_untagged_networks: Untagged networks can not be assigned to the same interface

node_management_error.title: Node Management Error
node_management_error.disks_configuration_warning: Only nodes with identical disk capacities can be configured together in the same action.
node_management_error.interfaces_configuration_warning: Only undeployed nodes with an identical number of network interfaces can be configured together in the same action.

nodes_tab.no_selected_nodes: There are no selected nodes to edit.
nodes_tab.disk_configuration_reset_warning: Disk configuration will be reset to default after roles change.
nodes_tab.no_nodes_in_environment: To add nodes to the environment, select the Add Nodes option, choose the nodes you want to allocate and assign roles to each.
nodes_tab.no_nodes_in_fuel: A pool of one or more unallocated nodes is needed for this operation. To add to the pool, configure nodes to boot from the network (a.k.a. PXE booting). Fuel will automatically provision and discover the nodes.
nodes_tab.role_conflict: This role cannot be combined with the other roles already selected.
nodes_tab.no_filtered_nodes_warning: There are no nodes found matching the filter value.

actions_tab.title: Actions
actions_tab.alert_delete: Clean up each node and return it to the pool of unallocated nodes. All logs from deleted nodes will also be removed.
actions_tab.reset_environment_description: Enables you to modify the settings for the environment and redeploy.
actions_tab.reset_environment_warning: This action will reset all existing nodes to their pre-deployment state, deleting your existing environment.
actions_tab.reset_disabled_for_new_cluster: Reset Environment is not available for an environment not yet deployed.
actions_tab.reset_disabled_for_deploying_cluster: Reset Environment is not available for an environment still being deployed.
actions_tab.repeated_reset_disabled: The current environment is already being reset.
actions_tab.update_environment_description: Enables you to update the environment to chosen release.
actions_tab.update_disabled_for_new_cluster: Update Environment is not available for an environment not yet deployed.
actions_tab.update_disabled_for_deploying_cluster: Update Environment is not available for an environment still being deployed.
actions_tab.repeated_update_disabled: The current environment is already being updated.
actions_tab.no_releases_to_update_message: You already have the latest release installed.
actions_tab.rollback_warning_message: Update of the environment to __release__ has failed.
actions_tab.rollback_message: You can retry update, or rollback the environment

verify_networks.step_0: Network verification performs the following checks:
verify_networks.step_1: 1. L2 connectivity checks between every node in the environment.
verify_networks.step_2: 2. DHCP discover check on all nodes.
verify_networks.step_3: 3. Packages repo connectivity check from master node.
verify_networks.step_4: 4. Packages repo connectivity check from slave nodes via public & admin (PXE) networks.
verify_networks.success_alert: Verification succeeded. Your network is configured correctly.

networking_parameters.use_vlan_tagging_fixed: Use VLAN tagging for fixed  networks

validation.invalid_ip_range: IP range start is greater than IP range end
validation.empty_ip_range: Please specify at least one IP range
validation.forbidden_vlan: This VLAN ID is used by other networks. Please choose another ID
validation.gateway_is_out_of_ip_range: This Gateway address is outside of network's CIDR
validation.gateway_is_out_of_internal_ip_range: This Gateway address is out of the internal network IP range
validation.need_more_vlan: The number of networks defined needs more VLAN IDs than available. Check VLAN ID Range field.
validation.invalid_id_range: The ID range start is greater than ID range end
validation.vlan_intersection: There is an intersection with the VLAN ID of other networks. Please set another ID range
validation.ip_start_is_out_of_ip_range: The IP start is outside of the IP range
validation.ip_end_is_out_of_ip_range: The IP end is outside of the IP range

logs_tab.title: Logs
logs_tab.bottom_text: Some previous lines have been skipped. Show more lines
logs_tab.no_log_text: No log entries match current filters.

healthcheck_tab.title: OpenStack Health Check
healthcheck_tab.deploy_alert: You must deploy your OpenStack environment before running tests against it.
healthcheck_tab.credentials_description: If you changed the credentials after deployment, you need to provide new ones to run the checks. The credentials won't be stored anywhere.

cluster_page.cluster_was_modified_from_cli: Some deployment parameters for this environment have been modified from Fuel CLI. Changes from Fuel CLI take precedence over any settings made from your browser. Proceed with caution.
cluster_page.unavailable_release: __name__ release is unavailable. The environment can not be deployed.

capacity_page.title: Capacity Audit
capacity_page.nodes_with_config: Number of nodes with this configuration

create_cluster_wizard.title: Create a new OpenStack environment
create_cluster_wizard.configuration_failed_warning: Your OpenStack environment has been created, but configuration failed. You can configure it manually.

name_release.title: Name and Release
name_release.name: Name
name_release.Ubuntu_connectivity_alert:
By default, packages will be fetched from external repositories. Please make sure your Fuel master node has internet access.
To specify alternate repositories, or to create a local mirror, please check the Settings tab before deployment.
name_release.CentOS_connectivity_alert:
Please make sure your Fuel master node has internet access.
To specify alternate repositories, or to create a local mirror, please check the Settings tab before deployment.

compute.title: Compute
compute.kvm_description: Choose this type of hypervisor if you run OpenStack on hardware
compute.qemu_description: Choose this type of hypervisor if you run OpenStack on virtual hosts
compute.vcenter_description: Choose this option if you have a vCenter environment with ESXi servers to be used as hypervisors
compute.vcenter_ip_description: Hostname or IP Address of vCenter
compute.vcenter_cluster_description: vCenter cluster name. If you have multiple clusters, use comma separated names.

network.title: Networking Setup
network.description: Choose the private (guest) network configuration. The choice you make here cannot be changed after you finish the wizard. More information see the
network.description_link: Mirantis OpenStack Planning Guide for Network Topology
network.hypervisor_alert: Neutron with VLAN or GRE segmentaion is not available with __Compute.vcenter__ as a compute option.
network.nova_network_description: Choose this option if you use VMware vCenter or require different subnets for public and floating IP addresses. Note that OpenStack is moving to deprecate nova-network in upcoming releases.
network.neutr_gre_description: The networking equipment must support GRE segmentation. This option supports up to 65535 networks.
network.neutr_vlan_description: The networking equipment must be configured for VLAN segmentation. This option supports up to 4095 networks.

storage.title: Storage Backends
storage.ceph_help: Ceph provides a shared backend for Glance images, Nova and Cinder volumes, and Swift objects, as well as copy-on-write between them in some cases. Ceph will require assigning Ceph-OSD role to several nodes in your cluster (at least as many as the configured replication factor). You can control the storage backend options for each component and the replication factor on the settings page.
storage.cinder_help: By default, Cinder block storage uses LVM volumes shared over iSCSI. Ceph backend requires two or more Ceph-OSD nodes and the KVM hypervisor.
storage.glance_help: By default, Glance image service uses Swift object storage. Ceph backend requires two or more Ceph-OSD nodes.

additional.title: Additional Services
additional.release_alert: Additional services are not available in __NameAndRelease.release_name__
additional.network_mode_alert: Murano requires Neutron as a network option.
additional.install_sahara_description: Sahara enables on demand provisioning of Hadoop clusters to be deployed on OpenStack utilizing a variety of vendor distributions.
additional.install_murano_description: Murano is an application catalog, which allows application developers and cloud administrators to publish various cloud-ready applications in a browsable categorized catalog, which may be used by the cloud users (including the inexperienced ones) to pick-up the needed applications and services and composes the reliable environments out of them in a “push-the-button” manner.
additional.install_ceilometer_description: Ceilometer provides metering and monitoring of an OpenStack cloud.

ready.title: Finish
ready.env_select_deploy: Your environment is now ready for deployment! After clicking on the Create button, you can select
ready.or_make_config_choice: or make additional configuration choices in the Fuel

dismiss_settings.title: Confirm
dismiss_settings.default_message: You have unsaved changes on this page. Do you want to discard your changes and leave the page?
dismiss_settings.verify_message: Network verification is in progress. You should save changes or stay on the tab.

display_changes.title: Deploy Changes

settings_changes.disks: Changed disk configuration of the following nodes:
settings_changes.interfaces: Changed interface configuration of the following nodes:

warnings.no_deployment: Environment configuration is invalid. Deployment cannot be started. Please check warnings below.

By default, packages and package updates will be fetched from repositories. Please make sure your Fuel node has internet access.
To specify alternate repositories, or to create a local mirror, please check the Settings tab before deployment.

display_changes.redeployment_needed: Some nodes have an error status after deployment. Redeployment is needed.
display_changes.locked_settings_alert: Please note that environment settings and node configuration will be locked after deployment.
display_changes.verification_not_performed: It is recommended to verify network settings before deployment.
display_changes.verification_in_progress: Your network verification is in progress.
display_changes.verification_failed: Networks verification failed with an error.
display_changes.get_more_info: For more information please visit the

delete_nodes.title: Delete Nodes
delete_nodes.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected nodes?

discard_changes.title: Discard Changes
discard_changes.alert_text: Are you sure you want to discard these changes?

remove_node.default_message: Fuel will remove this node from its database. This operation will not try to erase MBR or any data on this node. If you power on the node, it will boot bootstrap (discovery) system, and node re-appear in Fuel as new, unallocated server.
remove_node.title: Remove Node

remove_cluster.title: Delete Environment
remove_cluster.incomplete_actions_text: There are incompleted actions. Removing of the environment may fail and lead to inconsistent state.
remove_cluster.node_returned_text: Each node will be cleaned up and returned to the pool of unallocated nodes. All logs from deleted nodes will also be removed.
remove_cluster.default_text: Are you sure you want to delete this environment?
remove_cluster.enter_environment_name: Please type in the name of the environment "__name__" to confirm.

stop_deployment.title: Stop Deployment
stop_deployment.text: Are you sure you want to stop this deployment? Successful deployment may NOT be possible unless you completely reset the environment. Use with caution!
stop_deployment.provisioning_warning: Are you sure you want to stop this deployment? Any progress on nodes not yet provisioned will be lost and those nodes will be reset to their pre-deployment state.

reset_environment.title: Reset Environment
reset_environment.text: Are you sure you want to reset this environment? All nodes in the environment will be deleted and returned to their pre-deployment state. Disk and interface configuration will also be reset to defaults.
reset_environment.enter_environment_name: Please type in the name of the environment "__name__" to confirm.

update_environment.title: Update Environment
update_environment.text: Are you sure you want to update the environment?
update_environment.downgrade_warning: Are you sure you want to update the environment to earlier release?

rollback_environment.title: Rollback Environment
rollback_environment.text: Are you sure you want to rollback the environment?

retry_environment.text: Are you sure you want to retry update the environment?

error_dialog.title: Error
error_dialog.warning: A server error has occured. Please contact the administrators.

registration.title: Create Account
registration.agree_error: You need to accept Terms and Conditions

retrieve_password.title: Retrieve Password
retrieve_password.submit_email: Please submit your Mirantis Account Email and we will send your new password.
retrieve_password.check_email: Please check your email for new password

support_page.title: 支持
support_page.contact_text: 欢迎提出反馈和改进意见，请点击下面的按钮，我们将尽快回复您。
support_page.irc_text: 如果您有任何问题，可通过IRC（freenode.net网络的 #fuel 频道）联系开发者。
support_page.log_text: 如果您在使用Fuel Web的过程中遇到任何错误或异常，可能需要将日志提交给支持团队，请点击按钮下载：
support_page.register_fuel_content: 注册后能收到新版本和相关重要信息。另外，您在接下来的30天内将可得到基础支持服务!

configure_interfaces.title: 在__name__上配置接口
configure_interfaces.drag_and_drop_description: 使用拖拽在物理接口之间移动逻辑网络

nodes_tab.no_nodes_in_environment: 选择想分配的节点并设置角色
nodes_tab.no_nodes_in_fuel: 这个操作需要拥有一个或多个未分配节点的节点池。配置节点从网络启动来将它添加到节点池(PXE booting)。Fuel会自动发现节点。

sahara.label: 安装Sahara
sahara.description: 如果选择，Sahara组件将被安装。

murano.label: 安装Murano
murano.description: 如果选择，Murano组件将被安装。

ceilometer.label: 安装Ceilometer
ceilometer.description: 如果选择，Ceilometer组件将被安装。

objects_ceph.label: Ceph rados-gw对象
objects_ceph.description: 需要至少两个Ceph-OSD节点，与Swift不兼容

osd_pool_size.label: Ceph对象副本数量
osd_pool_size.description: 定义Ceph池中的对象副本数量。需要部署至少相应数量的Ceph-OSD节点。

debug.label: OpenStack调试日志
debug.description: 调试模式能够提供更多信息，但也需要更多磁盘空间。

auto_assign_floating_ip.label: 自动分配浮动IP
auto_assign_floating_ip.description: OpenStack将自动给新实例分配浮动IP

kvm.label: KVM
kvm.description: 如果在硬件上运行OpenStack，选择该类型的管理器

qemu.label: QEMU
qemu.description: 如果您在虚拟机上运行OpenStack请选择该类型的管理器

start_guests_on_host_boot.label: 主机启动时运行客户机
start_guests_on_host_boot.description: 在主机重启时是否需要重启客户机。 如果启用，此选项会导致nova-compute启动时无条件的重启客户机。如果客户机为停止状态，则启动它。如果是运行状态，则重启

use_cow_images.label: 为映像使用qcow格式
use_cow_images.description: 大多数情况下您需要qcow格式。如果设置为false，将使用原始映像格式运行虚机。基于原始格式的OpenStack当前不支持快照

auth_key.label: 公开密钥
auth_key.description: 部署节点时包含在authorized_keys中的公钥

vswitch.label: 打开'OVS VLAN splinters'特性（仅Neutron）
vswitch.description: 将VLAN splinters Open vSwitch方法使用到需要的网卡上。

actions_tab.title: 动作
actions_tab.alert_delete: 清除每个节点并放回未分配节点池

verify_networks.step_0: 完成网络验证的4个步骤:
verify_networks.success_alert: 验证成功。网络配置正确。

logs_tab.title: 日志
logs_tab.bottom_text: 前面的一些行被忽略。显示更多行
logs_tab.no_log_text: 当前过滤器没有找到任何日志。

healthcheck_tab.title: OpenStack健康检查
healthcheck_tab.deploy_alert: 在测试之前必须先部署新的OpenStack环境

capacity_page.total_number_alloc_nodes: 全部已分配节点的数量
capacity_page.total_number_unalloc_nodes: 全部未分配节点的数量

compute.title: 计算
compute.kvm_description: 如果在硬件上运行OpenStack，请选择该管理器类型
compute.qemu_description: 如果在虚机上运行OpenStack，请选择该管理器类型

storage.title: 后端存储
storage.cinder_help: Cinder块存储默认使用LVM卷和iSCSI共享存储。Ceph后端需要2个或更多Ceph-OSD节点与KVM管理器。
storage.glance_help: 在HA部署模式中，Glance Image服务默认使用Swift对象存储, 在简单多节点模式中，使用控制节点的本地存储。Ceph后端需要2个或更多Ceph-OSD节点。

additional.title: 附加服务
additional.install_sahara_description: 利用Sahara能在各大版本厂商的OpenStack上的部署Hadoop集群。
additional.install_murano_description: 利用Murano能将基于Windows的数据中心服务，如活动目录、IIS、Microsoft SQL和ASP.NET部署到OpenStack上。

dismiss_settings.title: 确认
dismiss_settings.default_message: 设置变更未保存，您想放弃变更并离开么？
dismiss_settings.verify_message: 正在进行网络验证，您应该保存变更或留在本页

settings_changes.disks: 以下节点的磁盘配置变更：

discard_changes.title: 放弃变更

remove_cluster.title: 删除环境

remove_cluster.node_returned_text: 每个节点都将被删除并放回未非配节点池。
